attributes.additional_details: Am sure a lot will agree people out there getting absused and this having a impact on there life's for the rest of the life people are hurting children and they walking away or giving a very little prision sentance I can't see we're the justice is something needs putting in place they say they have guidelines I can't see this if they was they would not walk free from court
attributes.background: On Tuesday my step farther was giving a prision sentance for a conspiracy in drugs in which they was no evidence it was just a jury found him guilty yet a peodafile that same day walked away from the court i think this matter needs awareness
